General.Name: Dayamitra Telekomunikasi PT
General.Description: PT Dayamitra Telekomunikasi Tbk. provides telecommunication infrastructure solutions. It operates in two segments: Telecommunication Tower Lease and Others. The company operates and maintains macro and small cells, colocations, and resellers. It also offers project solutions, such as fiber optic, service, tower, and mechanical and electrical solutions; managed services; and digital-based service or internet of things (IoT) infra solutions, such as remote tower management that has IoT enabled alarms for various sites. The company was formerly known as PT Dayamitra Malindo. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Dayamitra Telekomunikasi Tbk. is a subsidiary of PT Telekomunikasi Indonesia (Persero) Tbk.

1.Name: Mr. Ian Sigit Kurniawan
